title: Getting Started with Vue 3
content: Vue 3 introduces exciting new features like Composition API, Teleport, and Fragment support. Here's how to get started with this powerful framework.
author: Jane Doe

title: The Art of Frontend Design
content: Modern frontend design combines aesthetics with functionality. Learn how to create beautiful user interfaces that provide excellent user experiences.
author: John Smith

title: JavaScript Tips and Tricks
content: Discover lesser-known JavaScript features that can make your code more efficient, readable, and maintainable. Includes practical examples.
author: Alex Johnson

title: Building Responsive Layouts
content: Learn techniques for creating layouts that work perfectly across all device sizes. From mobile-first approaches to CSS Grid and Flexbox.
author: Sarah Williams
